description: Spirit Caves; Elevation gain: 500m.  Round trip: 5 km.  Time: 3 hours10 U 0612476	5490558	WGS 84                N 49°33.429? W 121°26.687?This trail has steep switchbacks leading to a view of Yale and the Fraser River.  At the top, the caves can be accessed but are hidden by large rocks.
directions: Head north on Water St. and follow Hwy #1 to Yale.  Park at the Spirit Caves sign on the left, located 23.5 km from Hope.
title: Spirit Caves
